column4: Hi, I want compression application with more options than the FileRoler
I do not have time for learning the shell
what options are you looking for in that application?
zip files are for compression AND archive
why would you want to avoid the compression?
large number of scanned documents with 600 DPI
using zip is the simplest solution no matter what if you don't want to use the shell
the price to pay for compressing is probably very minimal (and so far I don't see why you said they were compressed)
everyone here knows what a JPG is
do they also know they are compressed?
I am actually waiting the process to finish! :)
FYI jpg is a more compressed image file format than BMP, but is still compressible
it is compressible but it is time consuming with large files :)
